Html:
Hi everyone!

I am trying to diferenciate a doubleclick in a row of the datagrid from a double click in another part of the datagrid, for example, the scrollBar. Can I capture the double click event of a row? How?

Greeting

I think that this link will be usefull:

http://wpf.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=65726&ANCHOR#Post224574

Best Regards
Thanks a lot. I don't like the nature of that solution but it's simple and it works. So it is what I need. Thanks again.
